title: Episode 3 - Senator Tom Cotton + Notorious ACB Confirmation Recap
description:
Intro - Smug & Holmes recap the Amy Coney Barrett confirmation hearing process and give listeners a peak behind the curtain. 

18:40 - Senator Tom Cotton joins the crew to speak about the confirmation process and his rise in politics. 

ruthlesspodcast.com
